entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
